content:
[来源] e.huawei.com | [类别] 政务公告 | [时间] 2025-10-25 19:26 UTC
On November 7, 2024, Huawei assisted Shenzhen in winning the "World Smart City Award". Shenzhen government and Huawei jointly promoted the construction of a city-wide network, making Shenzhen the first city nationwide to build its own optical cable for government networks.
